titleStmt.title: By the King whereas, upon summons from vs, divers gentlemen of this our county of York did attend vs upon Thursday the twelfth of this instant May ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at Yorke, by Robert Barker ... and by the assignes of John Bill, and reprinted at London by A.N. for I.T.,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at York, the fourteenth day of May, in the eighteenth yeere of our reigne, 1642."
Other title information taken from first 4 lines of text.
Imperfect: torn and folded, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
